attributes.action: put forward a strong rebuttal to the Argentine Government's claims of the Falkland Islands, South Georgia Islands and South Sandwich Islands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On April 22nd this year, the Argentine government submitted over 800kg of documents to the UN which it claimed asserted its right to the continental shelf off its shores; a region of sea that includes soveriegn British territories: the Falkland, South Georgia and South Sandwich Islands. The Argentinians cannot be allowed to succeed in this endeavour.
